data.title: Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck's Complete Relationship Timeline
data.meta_description: A look at Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck's romantic dating history now that the two exes are back together and married.
data.text:
In case you missed it, we‚Äôve traveled back in time to 2002‚Äîan iconic era when Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez were together and starring in the never-critically-acclaimed-not-even-once film Gigli together. And by that, I mean: Bennifer has staged a zombielike return from the ashes of their relationship, gotten MARRIED, and can‚Äôt stop making out on yachts and random street corners.

It‚Äôs all just frankly HAPPENING, and obviously no one is okay, not even close. But in order to fully understand how meaningful this reunion is (and why the recent breakup rumors have us s-h-o-o-k), we have to go back. Back to the beginning. Because lest you forget, these two have a lot of history! Behold, a hefty timeline of Bennifer‚Äôs relationship‚Äîplus the relationships they‚Äôve had in between‚Äîin reverse chronological order (so all the juiciest updates are at the top)!

June 2024

There are a buncha moments where J.Lo is snapped wearing her ring while Ben isn't, which leads people to be very much üëÄ. Meanwhile, on June 8, TMZ reports that the couple is "quietly" trying to sell their $60 million home. Plus, an insider dishes to Entertainment Tonight on June 10 that "Jen is touring houses and shopping around for her own home. She has been leaning on her mom, sisters, and kids during this transitional period."

But when it comes to whether these two are actually splitting, a source tells the Daily Mail on June 6 that the Atlas star remains committed to saving the marriage: "She wants this marriage to work so much that she is willing to make any sacrifice including giving up being J.Lo. She doesn't want to be divorced. She doesn't want to end up like Madonna‚Äîon her own at 60."

As for how Ben's ex Jennifer Garner feels about the whole sitch? An insider notes to Us Weekly that she "is encouraging Ben to work on his marriage to Jen. She fully supports their relationship and wants nothing more than for him to be happy."

Fast-forward to June 21, and on the comedian‚Äôs show Hart to Heart goes live. In it, the actor makes some rare comments about his marriage to J.Lo. "We went somewhere with her‚ÄîI can‚Äôt remember because she‚Äôs so famous, and she creates this‚Äîpeople love her, and she really represents something important to people," he begins before doing an impression of fans screaming her name and adding, "It‚Äôs amazing, you know what I mean?"

The actor then recalls visiting Times Square in NYC, saying traffic was bad so he told her, "Fuck it, baby, we‚Äôre going to be late...we gotta walk a block and a half." Apparently, J.Lo "didn‚Äôt say shit," but when they got out of the car and went through Times Square, "the shit was like a-fuckin' bananas."

May 2024

First things first: one of the co-chairs of the Met Gala, J.Lo, shows up to the coveted fashion event solo. When asked about Ben, Jen reveals that he has filming commitments in LA (perhaps Netflix's The Greatest Roasts of All Time special).

On May 14, TMZ reports that Jennifer is seemingly shopping for homes in Beverly Hills alongside her longtime producing partner, Elaine Goldsmith-Thomas. The duo is pictured without Ben, and according to the outlet, Jen could've been "tagging along for Elaine" or "looking at houses for other people." ICYMI, she and Ben bought a $60 million mansion in Beverly Hills. However...

By May 16, TMZ reports that Ben has been staying at a Brentwood home all by himself. This is confirmed by Us Weekly later that same day, and then on May 19, an Entertainment Tonight source claims "they have been staying in separate homes and the tension has been high."

By May 28, an Us Weekly source notes that the two communicate "primarily to discuss essential matters and updates."

March 2024

Ben and J.Lo are spotted courtside at a Lakers game and can't help but be adorable.

Also, enjoy this:

February 2024

Bennifer attends the premiere of J.Lo's This Is Me...Now: A Love Story, and the celebs look incredible on the red carpet!

Around the same time, the singer makes an appearance in a Variety video in which she revisits notable lines from her movies over the years‚Äîincluding one from Gigli.

"The first time meeting him on that film was at the read-through," J.Lo recalls during the exercise. "They did a read-through of the whole thing and I remember kind of just walking in and I think he was outside, smoking a cigarette and I saw him and we just talked for like a minute and then I sat down and we did the read-through."

"I don't remember a whole bunch more about it, but I remember being on the set with him every day and loving it," she adds.

And because we know you're wondering, yes, the singer also provides insight as to whether or not she and Ben would ever be in another film together: "I don't know, in the right thing, maybe, in the right thing...I mean, we love working together and being together, so maybe."

Good! To!! know!!!

Oh, and P.S. February is a busy month for these two, and aside from interviews and movie premieres, J.Lo and Ben also find the time to ~chill~ together...namely by *checks notes* going to watch Dune: Part 2 together. Ahem:

Stars‚Äîthey're just like us!

January 2024

The month starts with J.Lo putting out legit *the* horniest track about Ben in her new single "Can't Get Enough."

Just some of the lyrics, you ask?

I feel like startin' something

You got my engine runnin'

You got the keys to turn me on and on

Oh, and also:

Give me that touchin', teasin'

So good I can't believe it

Don't wanna share with no one else

For all the deets on the *chef's kiss* banger, head right on over this way:

The following week, the couple makes an appearance at the 2024 Golden Globes, and the singer defends her husband's viral pap photos:

"Ben is doing alright. You don‚Äôt need to worry about Ben, let me just tell you. He is good. He is happy. He is here, he is nominated. I'm chilling, I don‚Äôt understand what people are so pressed for."

Around the same time, on January 17, a trailer for Jen's visual album, This Is Me... Now: A Love Story, drops, and it not only recreates Bennifer‚Äôs famous pap shot from 2002, but it also features the actor's name in a list of cameos alongside Trevor Noah, Kim Petras, Post Malone, Keke Palmer, and Sof√≠a Vergara.

The project officially drops on January 16, so stay tuned!

November 2023

Ben and Jen attend the LACMA Art + Film gala and look completely in love with each other:

September 2023

The pair is more loved-up and obsessed than ever during a shopping trip in L.A. Like, there's even butt-grabbing. It's a whole thing. Pics this way:

Meanwhile, a source tells the Daily Mail that these two are still "very much in love with each other" and "their relationship is still on fire." They're also "really happy with each other, and there's no drama in their relationship right now at all."

August 2023

Ben celebrates his 51 birthday and J.Lo drops a cute unseen video of them singing in the car together to celebrate. Awwww!

And and ANNNNND they celebrate their one-year wedding anniversary. Time flies when you're literally obsessed with each other!

July 2023

Jennifer celebrates her 54th birthday and writes allll about it via her newsletter On the Jlo, saying "Ben hosted it at our new house with our closest family and friends."

Pics incoming!

June 2023

J.Lo blesses the timeline with a ‚Äúdaddy appreciation post‚Äù featuring a partial nude of Ben for Father‚Äôs Day.

And just a few weeks later, an anonymous source dishes to the Daily Mail that the couple will be renewing their vows near the end of July or early August, proving that their bond is stronger than ever. ‚ÄúAll their kids are doing great, the families are all in sync,‚Äù the insider revealed. ‚ÄúAnd to celebrate all that, as they get closer to their first wedding anniversary, they both want to renew their vows and show how much in love they are with each other. They are not taking this second chance for granted.‚Äù S'cute!

May 2023

Jen opens up about what a great stepdad Ben is to her kids during an interview with the Today show, saying, ‚ÄúThey love Ben. He‚Äôs a wonderful, wonderful father and father figure to them as well, ‚Äôcause he has his own three beautiful children and then there‚Äôs us. He‚Äôs fantastic. He really steps up to the challenge of what [being a stepfather] is and what that means, and they love him.‚Äù

But then things take a turn for the dramatic when the couple are *allegedly* seen arguing on the Mother red carpet. Except, like, a lip-reader confirms they were actually just chatting about where to take pics?

March 2023

The couple attend the premiere of Ben‚Äôs new movie Air:

And meanwhile, Ben opens up *a lot* during a Hollywood Reporter interview tied to his new movie Air, so we‚Äôve gone ahead and taken the liberty to sift through it and highlight all the times he speaks about Jen‚Äîyw!

Apparently, she had tons of input in the Air script: Namely, when it came to providing significant context to the influence of Michael Jordan and his shoes at the time. ‚ÄúShe is incredibly knowledgeable about the way fashion evolves through the culture as a confluence of music, sports, entertainment, and dance,‚Äù the actor begins. ‚ÄúShe helped me in talking about the way in which a part of the reason why Jordans [the shoes] were so meaningful is because culture and style in America is 90 percent driven by Black culture. Black culture has historically pioneered music, dance, fashion, and it‚Äôs then been stolen, appropriated, remarketed as Elvis or whatever. And in this case, [Nike], a white-run corporate entity, was starting to do business with African American athletes in an identity affiliation sales thing. They were really taking value from what Michael Jordan represents and who he is. I don‚Äôt think the meaning can be overstated. They‚Äôre going to switch from ‚ÄòHey, guys, we are a nice shoe‚Äô to ‚ÄòIf Mike has it, you want it.‚Äô‚Äù

And he thinks Jen is v savvy when it comes to social media: ‚ÄúMy wife‚Äôs a genius at that. I don‚Äôt know if there‚Äôs anybody who understands Instagram better than her. In fact, she gave me a talk this morning before this interview. She thinks that because of experiences that I‚Äôve had, I‚Äôve become very guarded. And she‚Äôs right. I view these things as land mines, where if you say one wrong thing, your career might be over.‚Äù

She helped Ben after an incident where he was misquoted as saying that he blamed ex Jennifer Garner for his drinking: ‚ÄúIt didn‚Äôt matter how many times I said, ‚ÄòI do not feel this way. I‚Äôm telling you, I don‚Äôt blame my ex-wife for my alcoholism.‚Äô So, yeah. It‚Äôs hard. But anyway, so [Jennifer] tells me today, ‚ÄòRelax, be yourself. Have fun. You‚Äôre actually a fun guy who is real and genuine and you just seem so serious.‚Äô Do I seem serious? But as in many things, she‚Äôs really right. And she loves me. She‚Äôs looking out for me. She‚Äôs trying to help me. So it‚Äôs like, maybe I ought to fucking listen to her.‚Äù

And, yes, he talks about *that* Grammys moment: ‚ÄúI had a good time at the Grammys. My wife was going, and I thought, Well, there‚Äôll be good music. It might be fun. At movie awards shows, it‚Äôs speeches and, like, sound-mixing webinars. But I thought this would be fun. I saw [Grammy host Trevor Noah approach] and I was like, Oh god. They were framing us in this shot, but I didn‚Äôt know they were rolling. I leaned into her and I was like, ‚ÄòAs soon they start rolling, I‚Äôm going to slide away from you and leave you sitting next to Trevor.‚Äô She goes, ‚ÄòYou better fucking not leave.‚Äô That‚Äôs a husband-and-wife thing. I mean, some of it is, I‚Äôm like, ‚ÄòAlright, who is this act?‚Äô Like, I don‚Äôt keep up. My wife does, obviously.‚Äù So there you have it, folks! Problem = solved.

January 2023

These two attend the 2023 Grammys and send the internet spiraling over a seemingly tense convo. Lip-readers simply are not okay!

Aside from that, they star in‚Äîwhat else?‚Äîa Dunkin‚Äô Donuts commercial that airs during the Super Bowl:

And get some cute tattoos on Valentine‚Äôs Day:

Also in January 2023

Bennifer kicks off the year with a highlights reel we never knew we needed. Come for BTS pics from their wedding, stay for all the make-out sessions:

J.Lo also chats about blending her and Ben‚Äôs families during an appearance on the Today show, saying, ‚ÄúWe moved in together. The kids moved in together. It‚Äôs been, like, a really kind of emotional transition but at the same time all your dreams coming true. And it‚Äôs just been a phenomenal year. Like, my best year, I think, since my kids were born.‚Äù

December 2022

A cozy month for Ben and Jen that basically revolves around wearing comfy sweaters and spoiling each other for the holidays. As a source tells Entertainment Tonight, ‚ÄúBen is planning on giving Jen a couple of things that are special and sentimental that have taken him a long time to find. He is also planning on giving her beautiful jewelry and a couple of big things that are surprises.‚Äù

Most importantly though? The pair hold their first Christmas party as a married couple, and Ben sings!

And they make out!

November 2022

J.Lo opens up about her 2004 split from Ben during a lengthy interview on Apple Music 1‚Äôs The Zane Lowe Show. ‚ÄúIt was so painful after we broke up,‚Äù she said, via ET. ‚ÄúOnce we called off that wedding 20 years ago, it was the biggest heartbreak of my life, and I honestly felt like I was going to die.‚Äù

Oh, also, Ben and Jen have a cozy Thanksgiving with their families!

October 2022

After a couple of months of wedded bliss, Ben and Jen make their first red carpet appearance since getting married, showing up (in matching ‚Äôfits!) at Ralph Lauren‚Äôs show in California. Cute pics incoming:

August 2022

Ben and Jen are married! Again! The couple say ‚ÄúI do‚Äù for round two in front of friends and family at Ben‚Äôs Georgia home, and Jen dishes all the details in On the JLo.

‚ÄúNothing ever felt more right to me, and I knew we were finally ‚Äòsettling down‚Äô in a way you can only do when you understand loss and joy and you are battle tested enough to never take the important things for granted or let the silly insignificant nuisances of the day get in the way of embracing every precious moment,‚Äù she writes. ‚ÄúWe find ourselves in that long-desired time of life: having gratitude for all that life has shown us, even its trials and tribulations. That night really was heaven‚Ä¶.‚Äù

July 2022

Jen and Ben start the month holding hands and looking in love and whatnot while shopping for luxury cars, as ya do.

And then, surprise! They get married in Vegas.

J.Lo also changes her name, officially becoming ‚ÄúMrs. Jennifer Lynn Affleck,‚Äù and two seconds later, the couple goes on honeymoon in Paris, where they‚Äôre photographed looking all kinds of in love:

June 2022

J.Lo gets a super-cute manicure in honor of her and Ben‚Äôs ‚Äôship. Celebrity manicurist Tom Bachik completed the set and posted it to his Instagram with the caption, ‚ÄúIf you know‚Ä¶then you know. üèπ Jen and Ben forever #couplesgoals for the boss @jlo #nailsbytombachik. üíÖüèºüî•‚Äù

Ben also makes a cameo appearance in Jen‚Äôs doc Halftime. The film took us back to the early 2000s, when beyond cringeworthy and oftentimes racist media coverage of the singer was standard throughout the entirety of her relationship with Ben. As Ben puts it in the doc, ‚ÄúI said to her once, ‚ÄòDoesn‚Äôt this bother you?‚Äô And she said, ‚ÄòI‚Äôm Latina. I‚Äôm a woman. I expected this. You just don‚Äôt expect it. You expect to be treated fairly.‚Äô‚Äù

Shout-out to Ben, who has been J.Lo‚Äôs supporter since day one! And clearly she appreciates him because she posts this cute video in his honor on Father‚Äôs Day (it‚Äôs full of BTS moments):

May 2022

An insider tells Us Weekly that J.Lo ‚Äúwants the formalities out of the way so they can start their journey as man and wife sooner rather than later.‚Äù The source said she also wants to have a ‚Äúspectacular celebration‚Äù and mentioned she and Ben are ‚Äúcommitted to making this work and taking all the steps necessary to respect each other‚Äôs boundaries and learn from their mistakes the last time around.‚Äù

Another source shared similar sentiments to Entertainment Tonight. ‚ÄúBen and Jen want to get married soon,‚Äù said the insider. ‚ÄúThey are talking about having a destination or tropical wedding. They can‚Äôt wait to spend the rest of their lives together forever, happily in love.‚Äù

April 2022

Bennifer get engaged‚Äîagain!!!!!!! Jen breaks the news in her newsletter that we‚Äôre all now subscribed to, On the JLo:

And then Jen‚Äôs sister Lynda shares a glimpse at the ring on her Instagram Story:

So, what does J.Lo have to say about the proposal? Ahem: ‚ÄúDid you ever imagine your biggest dream could come true?‚Äù she writes (per CNN). ‚ÄúSaturday night while at my favorite place on earth (in the bubble bath), my beautiful love got on one knee and proposed. I was taken totally off guard and just looked in his eyes smiling and crying at the same time trying hard to get my head around the fact that after 20 years, this was happening all over again. I was quite literally speechless and he said, ‚ÄòIs that a yes?‚Äô I said, ‚ÄòYES, of course that‚Äôs a YES.‚Äô‚Äù

In non-relationship news, Bennifer‚Äôs $50 million house falls out of escrow, so they once again start touring mansions in Los Angeles, as one does.

March 2022

Ben and Jen buy a house together! And by ‚Äúhouse,‚Äù we mean enormous $50 million mansion estate with four (!!) kitchens. The home is nestled in a quaint little area called Bel-Air (lol), and they will be blending their families in it since ‚Äúthe entire brood from both sides will be living there.‚Äù

December 2021

Bennifer are spotted being cute at a Lakers game:

And they attend another movie premiere together!

Later in the month, J.Lo comes to Ben‚Äôs defense amid backlash for his interview about his ex Jennifer Garner. Shutting down reports that she was ‚Äúpissed‚Äù about his comments, J.Lo told People, ‚ÄúThis story is simply not true. It is not how I feel. I couldn‚Äôt have more respect for Ben as a father, a co-parent, and a person.‚Äù

October 2021

Ben and Jen hit up the premiere of Ben‚Äôs new movie The Last Duel.

And later that month, they‚Äôre spotted trick-or-treating with Jennifer Garner.

September 2021

Ben and Jen step out on their first official red carpet as a ‚Äúnew‚Äù couple, attending the 78th Venice International Film Festival!

A few days later, they make their Met Gala debut and this iconic/haunting photo happens:

Honestly, this month was a big one for their PDA:

July 2021

Fresh off the glow of Bennifer‚Äôs Universal Studios trip with their kids and their Fourth of July Hamptons getaway, Jennifer is spilling the deets on just how great she‚Äôs doing at the moment! In an , J.Lo says:

‚ÄúI‚Äôm super happy‚Ä¶I know people are always wondering, How are you? What‚Äôs going on? Are you okay? This is it. I‚Äôve never been better. And I want my people who care about me, because I care about them so much, to know that I‚Äôve really gotten to a place in my life where I‚Äôm great on my own. And I think once you get to that place, then amazing things happen to you that you never imagine in your life happening again. And so that is where I‚Äôm at. And I love all the love that‚Äôs coming my way right now and all of the good wishes. And I just want everybody to know that it‚Äôs the best time. It‚Äôs the best time of my life.‚Äù

Meanwhile, Us Weekly reports that ‚ÄúBen and Jen are spending almost every night together when they‚Äôre not working‚Ä¶they plan on moving in together very soon.‚Äù The source adds, ‚ÄúAs far as Jen sees it, she and Ben have their whole lives now to set things up in a comfortable way. She intends to be an involved stepmom who‚Äôs there for Ben in that area, plus she‚Äôll want him to make the same effort with her and Marc‚Äôs kids.‚Äù

But that‚Äôs not all‚ÄîJennifer and Ben go Instagram official on Leah Remini‚Äôs account:

And THEN they go official on J.Lo‚Äôs account for her 52nd‚Äîwith a kiss!

June 2021

Bennifer is still going strong, and Page Six publishes pics of them making out at dinner, which you can see right this way. Meanwhile, a source tells E! News that J.Lo ‚Äúis packing up her Miami rental‚Äù and gearing up to head to L.A. with her twins to be near Ben.

May 2021

Jen and Alex Rodriguez split and end their engagement! They announce their decision in a joint statement to the Today show amid (false!) cheating rumors:

‚ÄúWe have realized we are better as friends and look forward to remaining so. We will continue to work together and support each other on our shared businesses and projects. We wish the best for each other and one another‚Äôs children. Out of respect for them, the only other comment we have to say is thank you to everyone who has sent kind words and support.‚Äù

This same month, Ben compliments J.Lo for her May 2021 InStyle cover story, saying, ‚ÄúShe remains, to this day, the hardest-working person I‚Äôve come across in this business. She has great talent, but she has also worked very hard for her success, and I‚Äôm so happy for her that she seems, at long last, to be getting the credit she deserves.‚Äù

And then? Then things start HAPPENING. The exes are spotted out and about together, they take a trip to Montana, *and* TMZ reports that their ‚Äôship has ‚Äúbeen building since February‚Äù when Ben ‚Äústarted flooding her with emails‚Äù full of ‚Äúloving and longing.‚Äù Emails! Like‚Ä¶okay!

Meanwhile, Page Six reports that Bennifer‚Äôs ‚Äúpublic comeback romance‚Äù was supposed to happen in a ‚Äútightly controlled‚Äù way, but the paps ruined it. According to a source:

‚ÄúHe stayed at her house [in April], and she was planning to make an announcement that they are back together on Instagram. It‚Äôs all about timing with her. These are people who don‚Äôt like to be alone, and she really likes him. They have a long history there.‚Äù

January 2021

Ana de Armas and Ben are done. ‚ÄúThey have had numerous discussions about their future and they decided together to break up,‚Äù a source tells People, with another sourcing adding that the breakup is ‚Äúmutual and something that is completely amicable. They are in different points in their lives; there is deep love and respect there.‚Äù

We‚Äôll always have the memz!

March 2020

Ben and Ana de Armas start dating after meeting on the set of Deep Water. They‚Äôre spotted vacationing in Cuba, and it‚Äôs clear they‚Äôre a couple when Ben slides into Ana‚Äôs comments asking for photo cred.

February 2020

Ben tells the that J.Lo should have been nominated for her role in Hustlers, saying, ‚ÄúShe should have been nominated. She‚Äôs the real thing. I keep in touch periodically with her and have a lot of respect for her. How awesome is it that she had her biggest hit movie at 50? That‚Äôs fucking baller.‚Äù

That same month, he tells tells Diane Sawyer that in five years, ‚ÄúI would love to have a relationship that is deeply meaningful and one to which I could be deeply committed.‚Ä¶Five years from now, Ben Affleck is sober and happy and sees his kids three and a half days a week and has made three or four movies that are interesting to him. I directed two [movies] that he is hopefully proud of and is in a healthy, stable, loving, committed relationship.‚Äù

March 2019

J.Lo and A-Rod get engaged with a truly enormous ring!

October 2018

Ben and Jen Garner‚Äôs divorce is finalized, although they‚Äôd separated years earlier in June 2015. Around this time, Ben also splits from his girlfriend of a year, Lindsay Shookus (who was recently seen partying with A-Rod, just FYI!).

March 2017

A-Rod and J.Lo start dating! A source tells People, ‚ÄúShe seems excited. He has been around her family, and she really likes that he is a dad. She is aware, though, that he is a ladies‚Äô man too and is being cautious. For now, it‚Äôs just fun. She is single and enjoys dating.‚Äù

Here‚Äôs him gushing:

August 2016

J.Lo and Casper Smart part ways, with a source telling People, ‚ÄúThe relationship had just run its course‚Äù and that they‚Äôd ‚Äúhit a rough patch.‚Äù

January 2015

J.Lo tells HuffPost Live she has ‚Äúno regrets‚Äù about Ben Affleck, saying, ‚ÄúI would do it all over again, I think. I really would. Even the relationship part. I just feel like everything is part of your story and your journey and is meant to be and helps you grow if you‚Äôre willing to look at it, and I‚Äôm willing to look.‚Äù

However, she also says, ‚Äú[Gigli] was a very badly reviewed film. I was in a high-profile relationship at the time that fell apart in a really bad way, and so the kind of mix of those two things and the tabloid press had just come into existence at the time, so I was like a poster child for that moment. I was in the tabloids every other week about how my life was falling apart. It was a tough time.‚Äù

October 2011

J.Lo starts dating her backup dancer Casper Smart!

July 2011

J.Lo and Marc Anthony announce their separation, and their divorce is eventually finalized a couple of years later in June 2014.

June 2005

Ben and Jen Garner get married during a private ceremony in Turks and Caicos and go on to have three kids!

June 2004

J.Lo starts up a relationship with her ex Marc Anthony and they get married in June‚Äîfive months after her split from Ben. She later says in her book that he ‚Äúcame back into my life three days after I should have been at the altar saying ‚ÄòI do‚Äô to another man.‚Äù They go on to have two cute kids together.

Meanwhile, Ben Affleck starts dating Jennifer Garner (his costar in Daredevil!). Here they are flirting up a storm when Jen was married to Scott Foley and Ben was engaged to J.Lo.

January 2004

Jen and Ben confirm their split with a simple statement from J.Lo‚Äôs rep that reads, ‚ÄúI am confirming the report that Jennifer Lopez has ended her engagement to Ben Affleck. At this difficult time, we ask that you respect her privacy.‚Äù

September 2003

Just days before their wedding, Bennifer calls it off in a joint statement‚Äîciting the media frenzy surrounding them as the reason.

‚ÄúDue to the excessive media attention surrounding our wedding, we have decided to postpone the date. When we found ourselves seriously contemplating hiring three separate ‚Äòdecoy brides‚Äô at three different locations, we realized that something was awry. We began to feel that the spirit of what should have been the happiest day of our lives could be compromised. We felt what should have been a joyful and sacred day could be spoiled for us, our families, and our friends.‚Äù

July 2003

The couple arrives at the premiere for Gigli. The vibes? Slightly awkward.

November 2002

Ben proposes to Jennifer (for the first time!) with a ring that has been haunting me for more than a decade: a 6.1-carat pink solitaire. At the time, J.Lo tells Diane Sawyer that the proposal was ‚Äútraditional but also in a very spectacular way, as of course Ben would do it‚Ä¶it was very, very beautiful.‚Äù

That same month, Ben stars in J.Lo‚Äôs iconic ‚ÄúJenny From the Block‚Äù video:

September 2002

Jennifer and Ben inexplicably decide to film another movie together called Jersey Girl. Okay!!!!!

December 2001

Jennifer and Ben fall for each other on the set of Gigli, which would go on to absolutely bomb at the box office. It was truly the best of times and the worst of times.

^Watch at your own risk.

Welp, that‚Äôs it for now! We‚Äôll keep you updated, lol!
